a few notes
- BFX/USDT have had shit PR for years which continues to shoot them in the foot
- USDT redemptions haven't been affected by previous BFX w/d issues
- 850m of BFX funds in Crypto Capital likely frozen by INTERPOL for the time being

1123135033886302208.text:
cont
- USDT seems to have a much larger effect on alts than BTC
- u can cry about fake USDT all u want, but based on several accounts, this was the 1st instance of non-USD in USDT reserves, hence the ToS changes
- i havent used BFX for years but continue to use USDT occasionally

last 
- if u dont like USDT or BFX, dont use USDT or BFX
- market rate = fluctuates based on news and sentiment
- market peg = $1 when redeemed through Tether
- arb typically kicks in at $0.95 when it becomes profitable after fees
